today's video was sponsored by endl an
app that creates personalized
soundscapes to help you relax focus and
sleep
endl is a nonprofit app that takes
everything we know about sound and
combines it with technology and adapts
it to personal inputs like location
weather and even your heart rate
the result is real-time personalized
soundscapes designed uniquely to help
you operate at your highest potential
whether it's to relax focus or even
drift off to sleep at night
your circadian rhythm essentially your
biological clock is in tune with
nature's organic rhythms and cycles
endo complements these to improve how
you feel night and day
